page.title: 17CHURCHES
page.content:
We have 13 churches in Cirencester including Baptist, Church of England, Roman Catholic and United Reformed.
The{Parish Church}in the Market Place has a choir of 46 boys and men.One choir boy said he liked being in the choir because he made friends there. His Mother suggested he joined as he had a nice voice.The choirboys travel all over England and have even sung in Westminster Abbey. Some children raised over Â£100 for the {Church Bell Fund}by selling apples and eggs at school. The church had 12 new bells this year which cost Â£75,000.
Mr Rice has been a curate at the Parish Church for 3 years.He likes it very much although he works long hours He has found Cirencester a friendly place to live.
